scripts.css:min: cp public/css/modesto.css public/css/modesto.min.css; postcss public/css/*.min.css -u autoprefixer cssnano -r -m
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:assets
scripts.develop: npm run copy && npm run scss ; npm run css:min ; npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run scss ; npm run css:min ; npm run version; npm run html:replace
scripts.html:replace: node node_modules/replace/bin/replace.js '<link href="css/modesto.css" rel="stylesheet" />' '<link href="css/modesto.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />' public/index.html
